name: ITEM With GST Rate
query:
SELECT
    `tabItem`.`item_code` as "Item Code:Link/Item:120",
    `tabItem`.`item_name` as "Item Name:Data:120",
    `tabItem`.`item_group` as "Item Group:Data:120",
    `tabItem`.`stock_uom` as "UOM:Data:120",
    `tabItem`.`valuation_rate` as "Valuation Rate:Data:120",
    `tabItem Price`.`price_list_rate` as "Item Rate:Data:120",
    CAST(RIGHT(`tabItem Tax`.`item_tax_template`,2) AS int) as "Tax:Data:120",
    IF(STRCMP(`tabItem Tax`.`item_tax_template`,"")=1, 
        ROUND(`tabItem Price`.`price_list_rate`+(`tabItem Price`.`price_list_rate`*CAST(RIGHT(`tabItem Tax`.`item_tax_template`,2) AS int)/100),2), 
        ROUND(`tabItem Price`.`price_list_rate`)
    ) as "Sale Price:Data:120"
    
FROM 
    `tabItem` 
LEFT JOIN `tabItem Tax`
    ON `tabItem Tax`.parent = `tabItem`.name
LEFT JOIN `tabItem Price`
    ON `tabItem Price`.item_code=`tabItem`.item_code
WHERE `tabItem`.has_variants=0
